item.title: Cards

Flowcharts (Mermaid)
item.description: Flowcharts (Mermaid) Examples graph TD; A[Hard edge] --|Link text| B(Round edge) B -- C{Decision} C --|One| D[Result one] C --|Two| E[Result two] Usage {{< mermaid align="center" >}} graph TD; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] {{< /mermaid >}}
